start.gm_instructions: You must unlock the sector in order for the vessels to continue the transition after you lock it. ^^ Use GM selection to define start location when creating vessels

event.incoming_comms_text: We are glad to see you! You are cleared for docking, crew standing by.
I felt a great disturbance, if millions of voices suddenly cried out in terror and were suddenly silenced.

set_ship_text.name: CARGO_1
set_ship_text.hailtext: We are enroute through the sector for The Telleron Consortium. Moving passenger and cargo across the galaxy.
set_ship_text.desc: We are enroute through the sector for The Telleron Consortium. Moving passenger and cargo across the galaxy.

event.incoming_comms_text: Please state the nature of your Engineering emergency.
Hold your position in this sector, Priority Message for Commanding Officer incoming.
Commanding Officer, carry out debrief session with your crew if neccessary, then carry on.
